description: Dean Maxwell and Mark Evrett escape to the woods to a large mighty tree. The hirsute Evrett prods Maxwell with his fever rod. Maxwell's no stranger to assplay and when Buck Philips arrives on the scene for a daisy chain, all three start panting. The trio engages in the ultimate tree-way three-way. After fucking themselves crazy, Evrett and Maxwell feed their hot rods to Philips who coaxes the sap out of Maxwell.
title: Wild Oats, Scene #02
